title: Wonderful Three Bedroom Two Bath Home in Charming Miraloma Park
map_address: 394 Cresta Vista Drive near Molima Drive
posting_body: ['Single Family HomeWonderful single family home with detached garage located in charming Miraloma Park.', 'This two story home has a gorgeous open floor plan.', ' The lower level has one bedroom and one full bath.', 'The upper main level has a living room/dining room combo, remodeled designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, beautiful gas stove, custom made center island.', ' This home is loaded with natural light and has outstanding southern views from living room dining area and kitchen.', ' Lovely backyard with expansive deck and BBQ area.', ' You have a large one car garage with lots of storage space, sink and washer/dryer.', ' Centrally located minutes away from Glen Park, West Portal, Diamond Heights and Cole Valley.', "Enjoy Mount Davidson's urban hiking trails , Miraloma Playground & top rated Miraloma Elementary.", ' Close to charming West  Portola Village shops & restaurants.', 'Easy access to Hwy 280 & 101.', 'Must See.', 'No smoking!', 'Pets submit.', 'To schedule a showing please contact Bayside Management', 'show contact info', 'x0530.', 'Available September 15,2022.DRE#01351735', 'Features', 'Microwave', 'Hardwood floors', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Balcony, deck, patio', 'Garage parking', 'Fenced yard', 'Stove and oven', 'Heat - gas', 'Pet friendly']
